data.actual_result: A message appears saying the Channel order was updated
data.expected_result: No message appears (or one does saying no changes were made)
data.short_description: "Channel order updated." message appears even if there were no changes made
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into the server settings - Go to channels section - Make a few Channels - Go into the channels sorting menu  - Drag a channel around and place it exactly in the same place where it was before, without dropping it anywhere
